title: Fail to update
body:
Hi, i just tried to update, but keeps fail. 
It says "update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information."
Can somebody help me?
I am a Mac OSX user :/

replies.body: I'm getting the same error for this new 650mb update. I am using Windows 7 though. Can I get a Repair tool for Windows and i can post the results here too?

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Could you do the following for me.

* [Download](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech+Repair+Tool+Mac.zip) and run the HRT.
* Select '**Gather System & LoL Logs**'
* Locate the **LoL Logs.zip** generated to your desktop and upload the file to a host of your choice, reply back with a link to the file.
